assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Some of the authors are participants in the following Expert Centre examples mentioned: JG, UL – BARC; AM – Estonian Genome Center; CN, UL – SciLifeLab; OVS – Lifandis AS; KZ, CL – Excemet. Of these, Lifandis AS is a publicly owned commercial interface between Norwegian biobanks and health registries and industry. The other entities are public domain activities, receiving public and private project funding.

publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC
